text: @senatemajldr @kilmeade The Government's answer to COVID-19 is "Stay At Home"? Then why don't they use the same logic for School Shootings? COVID-19, gun violence, auto-accidents... ALL could logically be reduced with a Stay At Home order. STOP THIS "justified" ABUSE OF FREEDOMS. #OpenCommerceAmendment
